author: ceki
msg: Corrected the hideous error on the bylaws page where most of the page would
be shown as if it were a URL link.
This is due to a bug whereby velocity shortens elements with an empty body.
For example, the anchor was tranformed into .
This confuses most browsers and even kills IE.

author: nicko
msg: Fixed typo in example ant source. Property xdocs.src was used instead of docs.src
